General.Name: Carpinienne de Participations
General.Description: Carpinienne de Participations operates as an investment company. It holds 5.14% interests in Foncière Euris, which has a property portfolio that primarily consists of shopping malls. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Paris, France. Carpinienne de Participations is a subsidiary of Finatis Société Anonyme.
General.Address: 83, rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré, Paris, France, 75008
